flavor: You're shocked every day at how much food people need to survive.
effect: Lose 5 resources.

flavor: A member of the community is dying. One of your own.
effect: Lose 5 resources OR one member must be removed from the community.

flavor: You have too many threats out there to tolerate threats among your own.
effect: Lose 5 resources AND one member must be removed from the community.

flavor: You almost walked right past it, but you saw it in the corner of your eye.
effect: Gain 1d6 resources. If you have a Lucky member, instead gain 1d6 resources for each member of the community.

flavor: It's amazing how much more you can do when you work together.
effect: Collect 5 resources.

flavor: Your community is growing and diversifying.
effect: Gain a community trait.

flavor: You can see it...signs of civilization.
effect: Increment the Civilization Counter by 1.

flavor: There was a fire. Everything...it's gone. All gone.
effect: The community is disbanded.

flavor: Them or us? You lose either way.
effect: Lose 10 resources. If you have a Cutthroat member, instead gain 5 resources.

flavor: Those buildings look picked clean to the untrained eye.
effect: Collect 3 resources. If you have a Survivalist member, collect 10 resources.

flavor: It got cold faster this year.
effect: Lose a resource for each member of the community.

flavor: Everyone is pulling their weight.
effect: Collect a resource for each member of the community.

flavor: It's simple: follow the rules or leave. Though they never want to leave.
effect: One member must be removed from the community.

flavor: Community is about more than just survival.
effect: Gain a Civilization point. If you have a Helpless member, gain 2.

flavor: You thought youneeded the resources, but the risk wasn't worth it.
effect: If your community has an even number of members, disband.

flavor: You thought you could trust them, but you were wrong.
effect: If your community has an odd number of members, disband.

flavor: The decay of society is accelerating.
effect: Next round, increase the Extinction Counter by 2 instead of 1.

flavor: It terrifies you to watch the food stores dwindle.
effect: Lose 1 resource for each member of the community. If you have a Paranoid member, instead gain resources equal to the Paranoid member's cache (min 1 per member).

flavor: You can tell they want to trust each other. It's in their nature.
effect: Gain a trait. If you have a Charasmatic member, additionally gain the Town Hall trait.

flavor: There are calories everywhere in the forest, if you know where to look.
effect: Reduce Community Upkeep Cost by 1d2 next round. If you have a Self-Sufficient member, instead waive Community Upkeep cost for 1d2+1 rounds.

flavor: Tensions are rising and times are tough.
effect: Double your Community Upkeep cost next round. If you have an Efficient member, gain your upkeep cost instead of paying next round.

flavor: They left your community in ruins, but you're used to rebuilding.
effect: Lose all Community Traits. Gain 5 resources per destroyed trait.
Draw event carts until you draw a red event. If you have a Seer member, instead draw event cards until you draw a green event.

flavor: Everything is falling apart.
effect: Destroy 1d2 Community Traits. If you have a Resourceful member, instead gain one Community Trait
